channel.title: Logging commands
channel.description: Hey guys, I want to make a log that stores all commands the players use and all trades that go on. There has been some hacking lately on a server I co own. I need to help figure out who is hacking and who is receiving the items considering I'm not online to deal with it all the time. My server console does not show this log, I just want a log that sends the info to a notepad or something in the server, if that's possible. I'd love it if you guys could help

item.title: Logging commands
item.dc:creator: @50percentelf 50percentelf
item.description:
@50percentelf wrote:

You can probably steal it from another source like so.

if(c.playerRights >= 0) { playerCommand = playerCommand.toLowerCase(); try { BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./Data/logs/commands.txt", true)); bw.write("["+c.playerName+"] "+playerCommand); bw.newLine(); bw.close(); } catch (Exception e) {}

Read full topic
